title: Vitalitik
author: Vitalitik
content: Test your poker skills to win prizes such as MacBooks, iPhones, and more. Play against thousands of players worldwide on the first Metaverse poker platform. Do you have what it takes?Ready to dive in? Visit us at https://decentral.gamesWelcome to ICE Poker: the first Metaverse poker platform.Join thousands of players worldwide and play poker for big prizes such as MacBooks, iPhones, high-value NFT collections, and more. The best part? You can get started playing for free!This complete beginners guide will cover everything you need to know about ICE Poker: game modes, platforms, the prizes you can win, and how to start playing.Ready to dive in? Let’s get started.What Is ICE Poker?ICE Poker is a Metaverse poker game where you can earn $ICE token rewards, high-ticket prizes, rare skins, and digital collectibles by:    Winning tournaments.    Completing daily challenges.    Managing an ICE Poker team for a reward split.Definition $ICE is an in-game currency you can trade for other tokens or use to buy various things in ICE Poker.Every time you level up, you’ll also earn a chest that contains mystery prizes (more info on that later).Whether you’re a poker beginner or a seasoned vet, you’ll have a fun experience playing.PlatformsPlay at home or on go! ICE Poker is available on 2 platforms:    ICE Poker Metaverse: Immerse yourself into the virtual world of Decentraland for a unique poker experience. You can play in your desktop browser or on the desktop app. To download the app, go to Decentraland’s site.    ICE Poker Arcade app: Play on any mobile, desktop, or tablet browser with no download needed. You can also play multiple tables at once with our multi-table feature. Check out the Arcade app now.All of your rewards and in-game items work across both platforms.Game ModesICE Poker has 3 game modes:    Free Play Mode:Play free poker and level up to earn prizes!Receive free chips to play each day, complete challenges, and increase your chip stack to level up and get ICE Poker Chests. Free Play Mode is perfect for learning the ropes, testing out new strategies, or growing your ICE Poker level.    Challenge ModeChallenge Mode is similar to Free Play Mode but you also earn $ICE tokens.Receive free chips to play, and earn $ICE or Banked ICE for completing challenges and ranking high on the daily leaderboard. Aside from playing, you can also recruit other players to join your ICE Poker team. Manage and grow your team to earn a share of your players’ rewards.    Arcade ModeTest your poker skills and compete in 6-player, single table tournaments. If you place top 2 in any tournament, you’ll win badges that you can use to redeem for prizes in the Prize Shop such as iPhones, MacBooks, high-value NFT collections, raffle tickets, and more.Along with winning prizes, you can also rise up the Tournament Leaderboard to win bonus daily, weekly, and monthly rewards. $10,000 in rewards are up for grabs each month.Ready to dive in? Visit us at https://decentral.games

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: It's nice that you support Apple account login to sign in on your casino but it's really slow and can't continue further to create account. I'm interested to know the complete mechanics of your poker since the website mention that we need to wear some sort of NFT wearable before we can play on a certain table. Maybe providing a brief video description on the game mechanics will help players to understand well this poker game.What's exchange available to purchase this ICE token?

comments.body: Just want to clarify if you're an official staff from decentral.games? Was the domain name "decentral.game" really owned by Decentral considering what you linked here doesn't end on ".games" domain when clicked. Beware not to connect your wallets until we get some clarifications here.

You have to apply the same theme to FAQ page as well.3. Many links on the site are opening in new tab and that's annoying. You can change it to open in the same tab.

comments.body: OP I see you are new here and I will give you a warm welcome to the platform.  I had to check out for myself for site seeing but the the the site was too slow which pissed me off. I had to leave the site as I could no longer stay on it for more seconds.I think you should tell us your position or role you play for opening an account for this poker here. comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: Bro, no offense, but this announcement is absolutely stupid. There are too many words without any structure. It gives me burning eyes. Now that I've seen many ANN, and this? Consider other ANN before making your ownICE Poker and Metaverse and NFTs and $ICE Tokens? A bunch of buzzwords without a clear focus. Listen, you have the potential with the product, but not with this presentation.Think about purchasing a copper member and spending money on design ANN. Picture would f**king save us all from having to read so much text. By the way, multi-platform play? A wise move. Though, being more concise and clear would have helped your business even more

comments.body: OP, I will suggest that you tour around this forum the more and make contributions to several topics and posts of interest so you get familiar with the forum as a Newbie. This will help you understand how to moderate topics like this and gives you more credibility. I think that's how it works across all faces of life. As for Decentral Games (DG), I bit informed about it. It's a web3 gaming ecosystem company and I think the ICE poker is good enough. I also commend the User Interface and responsiveness.

comments.body: The site looks great, this I believe any one who knows good stuffs when they see one surely will agree.But then, I will not immediately trust this site, and not because the site looks odd in any, or has any red flag, but I will not trust the site because op is the red flag him or herself..He is a brand new user, who out of all he could choose as a username decided to go for this; which any one not paying attention to the letters will mistake it for Vitalik, was or is he trying to make some people(most especially newbies) believe that he is Vatalik buterin and trust him and his business here ? I do not know, but for this reason, I do not trust op and this site.
